title: Understanding the Controlled Substances Act
text: The Controlled Substances Act is a federal law that regulates the manufacture, importation, possession, use, and distribution of certain substances. It categorizes these substances based on their potential for abuse and medical use.

title: Categories of Controlled Substances
text: The Controlled Substances Act divides substances into different categories, known as schedules. Each schedule represents a different level of control based on the substance's potential for abuse and medical use.

title: Number of Schedules
text: Think about how many categories or schedules the Controlled Substances Act might use to classify substances.
